name: Hand Held Legend Logo ROM
description:
As some HHL fans expressed interest in checking this out for themselves, Hand Held Legend have decided to make their commissioned Logo ROM for the Game Boy Color available to download for free!  You can play in browser or download the .gbc ROM or .pocket file to play on your Game Boy Color or Analogue Pocket.

CONTROLSGame BoyKeyboardMove Cursor (menu)
DpadArrow KeysInteract (menu)
AZRestart Scene (when animation finishes)
StartEnterReturn to Menu (when animation finishes)
SelectShift

Hand Held Legend provide the means to deck out your retro consoles with all the bells and whistles we would have wanted when we were kids! You can head to their website to check out what's on offer from Game Boy to Switch and more.

This commission tasked me with creating a custom GBC ROM that would allow the folks at Hand Held Legend to display various animated HHL logos on their modded Game Boys for promotional purposes. I was very lucky to work with such a great crowd! Custom ROM/GB Art Commissions:
For anyone interested in discussing commissions with me regarding custom ROMs or sprite/background art assets for your Game Boy or Game Boy Color projects, please contact me through Instagram or Mastodon. Prices are negotiable and can be discussed on a per job basis.

Happy gaming!
Gumpy Function (Tom)
